verses.gurmukhi: AwgY ilKwrI ky dsqKq ] qÍ pRswid caupeI ]

en.bdb: Then the signatures of the Author (Guru Gobind Singh). BY THY GRACE QUATRAIN (CHAUPAI)

transliteration.en: aagai likhaaree ke dhasatakhat || tavai prasaadh chaupiee ||
transliteration.hi: आगै लिखारी के दसतखत ॥ त्व प्रसादि चउपई ॥
transliteration.ur: آگَے لکھاریِ کے دستکھت ۔۔ تو پرساد چاپای ۔۔

en.bdb: I Salute the One Primal Lord.

pu.ss: (mYN) sB qoN pihlw EAMkwr srUp nUM pRnwm krdw hw
pu.bdb: (mYN) sB qoN pihlw EAMkwr srUp nUM pRnwm krdw hw

en.bdb: Who pervades the watery, earthly and heavenly expanse.

pu.ss: (ijs ny) jl, Ql Aqy AwkwS dw pswr kIqw hY।
pu.bdb: (ijs ny) jl, Ql Aqy AwkwS dw pswr kIqw hY।

en.bdb: That Primal Purusha is Unmanifested and Immortal.

pu.ss: auh Awid purK, dyh-rihq Aqy AivnwSI hY
pu.bdb: auh Awid purK, dyh-rihq Aqy AivnwSI hY

en.bdb: His Light illumines the fourteen worlds. I.

pu.ss: Aqy cOdw lokw nUM (aus ny AwpxI) joiq nwl pRkwSmwn kr riKAw hY ]1]
pu.bdb: Aqy cOdw lokw nUM (aus ny AwpxI) joiq nwl pRkwSmwn kr riKAw hY ]1]

en.bdb: He hath merged Himself within the elephant and the worm.

pu.ss: jo hwQI qoN lY ky kIVy qk (sB ivc) smwieAw hoieAw hY
pu.bdb: jo hwQI qoN lY ky kIVy qk (sB ivc) smwieAw hoieAw hY

verses.gurmukhi: rwv rMk ijh iek sr jwnw ]

en.bdb: The king and the baggar equal before Him.

pu.ss: Aqy rwjy qy iBKwrI nUM iek-smwn smJdw hY,
pu.bdb: Aqy rwjy qy iBKwrI nUM iek-smwn smJdw hY,

transliteration.en: raav ra(n)k jeh ik sar jaanaa ||
transliteration.hi: राव रंक जिह इक सर जाना ॥
transliteration.ur: راو رںک جه اک سر جانا ۔۔

en.bdb: That Non-dual and Imperceptible Purusha is Inseparable.

pu.ss: auh dÍYq-rihq, AidRS purS vwsqivkqw dw igAwnvwn
pu.bdb: auh dÍYq-rihq, AidRS purS vwsqivkqw dw igAwnvwn

en.bdb: He reaches the inner core of every heart.2.

pu.ss: Aqy hr iek dy idl dIAW jwxn vwlw hY ]2]
pu.bdb: Aqy hr iek dy idl dIAW jwxn vwlw hY ]2]

en.bdb: He is an Inconceivable Entity, Exernal and Garbless.

pu.ss: auh idsx qoN pry, nw nSt hox vwlw Aqy ByKw qoN rihq hY,
pu.bdb: auh idsx qoN pry, nw nSt hox vwlw Aqy ByKw qoN rihq hY,

verses.gurmukhi: rwg rMg ijh rUp n ryKw ]

en.bdb: He is without attachment, colour, form and mark.

pu.ss: aus dw iksy pRiq moh (nhIN hY, aus dw) rMg rUp jw ryKw nhIN hY,
pu.bdb: aus dw iksy pRiq moh (nhIN hY, aus dw) rMg rUp jw ryKw nhIN hY,

transliteration.en: raag ra(n)g jeh roop na rekhaa ||
transliteration.hi: राग रंग जिह रूप न रेखा ॥
transliteration.ur: راگ رںگ جه رُوپ ن رےکھا ۔۔

en.bdb: He distinct from all others of various colours and signs.

pu.ss: auh vrn, icMnH (Awid) sB qoN inAwrw hY;
pu.bdb: auh vrn, icMnH (Awid) sB qoN inAwrw hY;

en.bdb: He is the Primal Purusha, Unique and Changeless.3.

pu.ss: auh Awid purK, AdÍYq-srUp Aqy ivkwrw qoN rihq hY ]3]
pu.bdb: auh Awid purK, AdÍYq-srUp Aqy ivkwrw qoN rihq hY ]3]

verses.gurmukhi: brn ichn ijh jwq n pwqw ]

en.bdb: He is without colour, mark, caste and lineage.

pu.ss: ijs dy vrn, icMnH, jwiq Aqy brwdrI nhIN hY,
pu.bdb: ijs dy vrn, icMnH, jwiq Aqy brwdrI nhIN hY,

transliteration.en: baran chihan jeh jaat na paataa ||
transliteration.hi: बरन चिहन जिह जात न पाता ॥
transliteration.ur: برن چهن جه جات ن پاتا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: s`qR im`qR ijh qwq n mwqw ]

en.bdb: He is the without enemy, friend, father and mother.

pu.ss: ijs dy vYrI, imqr, mwqw Aqy ipqw nhIN hn,
pu.bdb: ijs dy vYrI, imqr, mwqw Aqy ipqw nhIN hn,

transliteration.en: sa'tr mi'tr jeh taat na maataa ||
transliteration.hi: सत्त्र मित्त्र जिह तात न माता ॥
transliteration.ur: سّتر مّتر جه تات ن ماتا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sB qy dUir sBn qy nyrw ]

en.bdb: He is far away from all and closest to all.

pu.ss: jo sB qoN dUr Aqy sB dy nyVy hY,
pu.bdb: jo sB qoN dUr Aqy sB dy nyVy hY,

transliteration.en: sabh te dhoor sabhan te neraa ||
transliteration.hi: सभ ते दूरि सभन ते नेरा ॥
transliteration.ur: سبھ تے دُور سبھن تے نےرا ۔۔

en.bdb: His dwelling is within water, on earth and in heavens.4.

pu.ss: ijs dw jl, Ql Aqy AwkwS ivc invws hY ]4]
pu.bdb: ijs dw jl, Ql Aqy AwkwS ivc invws hY ]4]

en.bdb: He is Limitless Entity and hath infinite celestial strain.

pu.ss: aus dw srUp sImw-rihq (Apr Apwr) Aqy aus dI bwxI ibnw iksy AwGwq qoN pYdw hox vwlI hY।
pu.bdb: aus dw srUp sImw-rihq (Apr Apwr) Aqy aus dI bwxI ibnw iksy AwGwq qoN pYdw hox vwlI hY।

en.bdb: The goddess Durga takes refuge at His Feet and abides there.

pu.ss: aus dy crnw dI Et ivc mwieAw ('BvwnI') vsdI hY।
pu.bdb: aus dy crnw dI Et ivc mwieAw ('BvwnI') vsdI hY।

en.bdb: Brahma and Vishnu Could not know His end.

pu.ss: bRhmw Aqy ivSxU ny aus dw AMq nhIN pwieAw
pu.bdb: bRhmw Aqy ivSxU ny aus dw AMq nhIN pwieAw

en.bdb: The four-headed god Brahma described Him ad ‘Neti Neti’ (Not this, Not this).5.

pu.ss: sgoN (bRhmw ny Awpxy) cOhw mu`Kw qoN aus nUM byAMq byAMq (nyiq nyiq) ikhw hY ]5]
pu.bdb: sgoN (bRhmw ny Awpxy) cOhw mu`Kw qoN aus nUM byAMq byAMq (nyiq nyiq) ikhw hY ]5]

en.bdb: He hath created millions of Indras and Upindras (smaller Indras).

pu.ss: aus ny kroVw ieMdr Aqy aupieMdr (vwmn Avqwr) pYdw kIqy hn,
pu.bdb: aus ny kroVw ieMdr Aqy aupieMdr (vwmn Avqwr) pYdw kIqy hn,

en.bdb: He hath created and destroyed Brahmas and Rudras (Shivas).

pu.ss: aus ny bRhmw, rudR (iSv) nUM isrijAw Aqy sMGwirAw hY;
pu.bdb: aus ny bRhmw, rudR (iSv) nUM isrijAw Aqy sMGwirAw hY;

en.bdb: He hath created the play of fourteen worlds.

pu.ss: aus ny cOdw lokw dI Kyf rcI hoeI hY
pu.bdb: aus ny cOdw lokw dI Kyf rcI hoeI hY

en.bdb: And then Himself merges it within His Self.6.

pu.ss: Aqy iPr Awpxy ivc hI aus nUM smyt lYNdw hY ]6]
pu.bdb: Aqy iPr Awpxy ivc hI aus nUM smyt lYNdw hY ]6]

en.bdb: Infinite demons, gods and Sheshanagas.

pu.ss: aus ny byAMq dYNq, dyvqy, SySnwg,
pu.bdb: aus ny byAMq dYNq, dyvqy, SySnwg,

en.bdb: He hath created Gandharvas, Yakshas and being of high character.

pu.ss: gMDrb Aqy SuB Awcwr vwly XkSw dI rcnw kIqI;
pu.bdb: gMDrb Aqy SuB Awcwr vwly XkSw dI rcnw kIqI;

en.bdb: The story of past, future and present.

pu.ss: BUq, BivS Aqy vrqmwn (dIAW Gtnwvw) dI kQw khwxI vI auh Awp hI hY;
pu.bdb: BUq, BivS Aqy vrqmwn (dIAW Gtnwvw) dI kQw khwxI vI auh Awp hI hY;

verses.gurmukhi: Gt Gt ky pt pt kI jwnI ]7]

en.bdb: Regarding the inward recesses of every heart are known to Him.7.

pu.ss: auh hr iek SrIr dI gupq qoN gupq g`l nUM jwxdw hY ]7]
pu.bdb: auh hr iek SrIr dI gupq qoN gupq g`l nUM jwxdw hY ]7]

transliteration.en: ghaT ghaT ke paT paT kee jaanee ||7||
transliteration.hi: घट घट के पट पट की जानी ॥७॥
transliteration.ur: گھٹ گھٹ کے پٹ پٹ کیِ جانیِ ۔۔۷۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qwq mwq ijh jwq n pwqw ]

en.bdb: He Who hath no father, mother caste and lineage.

pu.ss: aus dw nw koeI ipqw hY, nw mwqw, nw aus dI koeI jwiq hY Aqy nw hI brwdrI;
pu.bdb: aus dw nw koeI ipqw hY, nw mwqw, nw aus dI koeI jwiq hY Aqy nw hI brwdrI;

transliteration.en: taat maat jeh jaat na paataa ||
transliteration.hi: तात मात जिह जात न पाता ॥
transliteration.ur: تات مات جه جات ن پاتا ۔۔

en.bdb: He is not imbues with undivided love for anyone of them.

pu.ss: auh iksy iek nwl (ivSyS rUp ivc) sMbMiDq nhIN hY।
pu.bdb: auh iksy iek nwl (ivSyS rUp ivc) sMbMiDq nhIN hY।

en.bdb: He is merged in all lights (souls).

pu.ss: auh sB dIAW joqw ivc smwieAw hoieAw hY;
pu.bdb: auh sB dIAW joqw ivc smwieAw hoieAw hY;

en.bdb: I have recognized Him within all and visualized Him at all places. 8.

pu.ss: (mYN) aus nUM sB ivc Aqy swrIAW Qwvw ivc (vsdw hoieAw) pCwixAw hY ]8]
pu.bdb: (mYN) aus nUM sB ivc Aqy swrIAW Qwvw ivc (vsdw hoieAw) pCwixAw hY ]8]

en.bdb: He is deathless and a non-temporal Entity.

pu.ss: auh kwl (imRqU) qoN pry Aqy aus dw srUp kwl (dIAW sImwvw) qoN mukq hY;
pu.bdb: auh kwl (imRqU) qoN pry Aqy aus dw srUp kwl (dIAW sImwvw) qoN mukq hY;

en.bdb: He is Imperceptible Purusha, Unmanifested and Unscathed.

pu.ss: auh nw jwixAw jw skx vwlw, AivAkq, mwieAwvI pRBwv qoN mukq purS hY।
pu.bdb: auh nw jwixAw jw skx vwlw, AivAkq, mwieAwvI pRBwv qoN mukq purS hY।

verses.gurmukhi: jwq pwq ijh ichn n brnw ]

en.bdb: He Who is without caste, lineage, mark and colour.

pu.ss: aus dI jwiq, brwdrI, icMnH Aqy vrn nhIN hY।
pu.bdb: aus dI jwiq, brwdrI, icMnH Aqy vrn nhIN hY।

transliteration.en: jaat paat jeh chihan na baranaa ||
transliteration.hi: जात पात जिह चिहन न बरना ॥
transliteration.ur: جات پات جه چهن ن برنا ۔۔

en.bdb: The Unmanifest Lord is Indestructible and ever Stable.9.

pu.ss: auh AivAkq, AivnwSI Aqy Brmw qoN rihq prm-s`qw hY ]9]
pu.bdb: auh AivAkq, AivnwSI Aqy Brmw qoN rihq prm-s`qw hY ]9]

verses.gurmukhi: sB ko kwl sBn ko krqw ]

en.bdb: He is the Destroyer of all and Creator of all.

pu.ss: auh sB dw nwS krn vwlw Aqy sB dw isrjk hY;
pu.bdb: auh sB dw nwS krn vwlw Aqy sB dw isrjk hY;

transliteration.en: sabh ko kaal sabhan ko karataa ||
transliteration.hi: सभ को काल सभन को करता ॥
transliteration.ur: سبھ کو کال سبھن کو کرتا ۔۔

en.bdb: He is the Remover of maladies, sufferings and blemishes.

pu.ss: auh rog, sog Aqy doKw (pwpw) nUM nwS krn vwlw hY।
pu.bdb: auh rog, sog Aqy doKw (pwpw) nUM nwS krn vwlw hY।

verses.gurmukhi: eyk ic`q ijh iek iCn iDAwieE ]

en.bdb: He Who meditates upon Him with single mind even for an instant

pu.ss: aus dw ijs ny iekwgR ic`q iek iCx leI vI iDAwn kIqw hY,
pu.bdb: aus dw ijs ny iekwgR ic`q iek iCx leI vI iDAwn kIqw hY,

transliteration.en: ek chi't jeh ik chhin dhiaaio ||
transliteration.hi: एक चित्त जिह इक छिन धिआइओ ॥
transliteration.ur: اےک چّت جه اک چھن دھآااو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kwl Pws ky bIc n AwieE ]10]

en.bdb: He doth not come within the trap of death. 10.

pu.ss: auh iPr kwl (imRqU) dy PMDy ivc nhIN Psdw ]10]
pu.bdb: auh iPr kwl (imRqU) dy PMDy ivc nhIN Psdw ]10]

transliteration.en: kaal faas ke beech na aaio ||10||
transliteration.hi: काल फास के बीच न आइओ ॥१०॥
transliteration.ur: کال پھاس کے بیِچ ن آااو ۔۔۱۰۔۔
